bonus.value: When a target is being healed, their volt ATK is increased by 15%/18%/21%/25% for 20 seconds. This effect does not stack, and only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.

When healing yourself or your Electrode, the target of healing gains a charge of "Lightning." The next attack within 30 seconds is imbued with "Lightning," dealing damage equal to 300%/375%/450%/525% of volt ATK (damage caused by Electrodes is reduced by 50%). Cannot be triggered more than once in 10 seconds. "Lightning" charges do not stack. Only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.

mind.name: Alloy Cells
mind.desc: More than half of the hull has been replaced. I wonder if there is a way to measure the proportion of souls?

memory.name: Teddy Bear
memory.desc: I have lost two places to call home, but fortunately some belongings stayed with me throughout the time.

belief.name: Refreshed
belief.desc: The innocence wears away, and the courage looks more mature and polished.

emotion.name: Inner Drive
emotion.desc: The memory and heart of humanity can be a stumbling block or a driving force.
